column1: At this time there began to be much talk about a voyage of exploration to that country which Leif had discovered. The leader of this expedition was Thorstein Ericsson
column2: who was a good man and an intelligent
column3: and blessed with many friends. Eric was likewise invited to join them
column4: for the men believed that his luck and foresight would be of great furtherance. He was slow in deciding
column6: when his friends besought him to go. They thereupon equipped that ship in which Thorbiorn had come out
column7: and twenty men were selected for the expedition. They took little cargo with them
